cells.data:
## 1 Liftover

for filename in *chain; do ~/genomicsTools/liftOver/liftOver -minMatch=0.1 -multiple ../../pipeline_output_2/1.berman_enhancers.bed $filename ../../pipeline_output_2/2.liftOver/output.$filename.bed ../../pipeline_output_2/2.liftOver/unlifted.$filename.bed; done

## Count

wc -l *bed

## Append species name

for file in output*; do awk 'BEGIN{OFS="\t"}{print $0, FILENAME}' $file > fixed.$file; done

## concatenate 

cat fixed.output.Dmel_to_MEMB00* > 2a.liftover_output_ALL.bed

## To check 

wc -l *ALL.bed

## Clean up in R using 2a.liftover.FastaFromBed

## Run fasta from bed
for filename in *.fa; do ~/genomicsTools/bedtools2/bin/fastaFromBed -fi $filename -bed ../../pipeline_output_2/2.liftOver/2b.outputForFastaFromBED.bed -fo ../../pipeline_output_2/3.fasta_creation/fastaFromBED_output_$filename -name; done

## concatenate

cat fastaFromBED_output_MEMB00* > 3.fastaFromBED_ALL.fa

# check in full directory
grep -rc "^>" *

# extract  enhancerNames

cat 3.fastaFromBed_ALL.fa | bioawk -c fastx ' $name  { print $name }' | grep -o '^[^|]*' | sed '/^\s*$/d' | sort | uniq > enhancerNames

# to make .fa by enhancerName

while read line; do cat 3.fastaFromBed_ALL.fa | bioawk -cfastx ' $name ~ /'$line'/ { print ">" $name "\n" $seq }' >> ../4.enhancer_alignment/$line.fa; done < enhancerNames
